column4: The problem: installed 11.10 today. Upon turning the computer on I got nothing after the motherboard bit: just a blank screen and a blinking cursor. Followed part 13 of this guide http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=1195275 to reinstall GRUB. I now get a DOS-like screen when I turn the computer on, titled "GNU GRUB version 1.99". I tried the command "boot", it says "no loaded kernel". I...
...tried "exit" and it says "operating system not found". But if I reload from the install CD, the install CD recognises that I have 11.10 installed.
